tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_topology (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    mac_address VARCHAR(17),
    port_number INT,
    connected_devices JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE network_topology (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    ip_address INET NOT NULL,
    mac_address MACADDR NOT NULL,
    latency_ms INT
);

CREATE TABLE device_inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    model TEXT,
    vendor TEXT,
    version TEXT,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE network_topology (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR,
    device_type VARCHAR,
    device_ip VARCHAR,
    device_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE device_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR,
    device_type VARCHAR,
    manufacturer VARCHAR,
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE network_mapping (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    connection_type VARCHAR,
    connection_speed INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_inventory(id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_topology (
  node_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  node_name TEXT,
  node_type TEXT,
  connection_type TEXT,
  connection_speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE device_inventory (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name TEXT,
  device_type TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE connections (
  connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_node_id INT,
  destination_node_id INT,
  latency INT,
  bandwidth INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_mapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  node_id INT,
  connection_id INT,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkDevices (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  ip_address INET,
  mac_address MACADDR,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkConnections (
  connection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id),
  connected_device_id UUID REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id),
  port_number INT,
  connection_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTopology (
  topology_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id),
  connected_device_id UUID REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id),
  connection_id INT REFERENCES NetworkConnections(connection_id),
  link_speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceInventory (
  inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  model VARCHAR(255),
  serial_number VARCHAR(50)
);
